articles.description: Sony has taken aim at the suddenly enormous market of people who want to self-produce high-quality video with a minimum of setup. Its ZV-1 mutates the versatile RX100 series into a selfie video machine, and it could be the all-in-one solution many a vlogger h…

articles.author: Peter Grad
articles.title: New jailbreak tool unlocks almost all iPhones - Tech Xplore
articles.description: A new jailbreak tool that works on almost all iPhones in use today was released Saturday.
articles.content:
A new jailbreak tool that works on almost all iPhones in use today was released Saturday.

articles.author: Steve Watts
articles.title: Is Redd's Art In Animal Crossing Fake Or Real? Datamining Reveals The Odds - GameSpot
articles.description: A dataminer has figured out the percentage chances that Redd will offer absolutely no legitimate artwork in Animal Crossing: New Horizons.
articles.content: We already knew that Jolly Redd, the shady art dealer in Animal Crossing: New Horizons, is an unscrupulous fellow. He shows up on a rickety boat, invites you into a dimly lit room, and sells artwork … [+2549 chars]
